oai_dc:dc.dc:title: United Daughters of the Confederacy application of Mary Evelyn Bragg Stone
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mrs. Stone was the great niece of two soldiers. Pvt. George Harris, Co. E, 4th Tenn. Cav., CSA, served under Baxter Smith. Pvt. G. W. Harris entered service Sept. 20, 1863, deserted April 25, 1864, and took the oath of allegiance March 4, 1865. Her grand-uncle James Harris was killed at the Battle of Murfreesboro. She was admitted to the UDC on May 4, 1926 and entered on the state roll book on July 14, 1926. The application was notarized in Cannon County on April 14, 1928.
